observation: Working Solutions | Outsourced Customer Service Call Center Support  Skip to main content Enable accessibility for visually impaired Open the accessibility menu Open the Accessible Navigation Menu Manage Consent This website uses cookies to personalize and improve your experience. Continue browsing our site if you agree to our Cookie Policy Manage Cookies Functional The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network. Preferences The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user. Statistics The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. Your Ultimate Partner for Customer Service Outsourcing To serve clients well, Working Solutions ranks among the best outsourced customer service providers in the contact center industry. Our business process outsourcing (BPO) produces excellent customer experiences (CX) for everyday commerce, unexpected events and long-range projects. A virtual network of 150,000+ professional agents scales to meet fluctuating demand, ensuring real-time flexibility for service and sales. CX Performance Lagging?  Boost Skills and Flexibility. Workforce speed to proficiency and scalability make or break customer service. Agents must acclimate fast to perform well. And stay sharp to flex up and down for sustained service Achieve More → Service Ops a Cost Center?  Profit From Them Instead. Better to optimize CX operations and turn a profit Make Service Pay → Caught In a Crunch?  Rev Up CX Solutions. When the business goes sideways, customer experiences suffer. So, why not deploy quick-turn solutions that accelerate sales and service? Maximize Results → Artificial Intelligence and Intelligent Agents™ Squeezed by budget cuts and labor shortages, businesses turn to artificial intelligence (AI) to economize and expedite service. AI, however, doesn’t always mesh with legacy IT for the best customer experiences. And technological upgrades can be expensive and disruptive. Our AI + IA Learn how we do it – AI + IA → Empathetic Service – Living Life to the Fullest It was a call from a man whose life was ending. He wanted to compile his bucket list. Diagnosed with terminal cancer, he asked the agent’s help to book concerts, shows and games—whatever entertainment she could find. If not, then they should ask: “Why not?” Desired results include sharper analytics to target offerings, streamlined processes to accelerate business and customer insights to increase sales. After nearly three decades, Working Solutions continues to perfect its virtual operations, fine-tuning them to deliver cost-effective customer service. On average, we optimize back-office support by 40%, reduce handle times by 25% and upsell 20% more. Our on-demand CX expertise enables you to better engage, empathize with and delight customers, wherever and whenever they interact with your brand. © Working Solutions 2024. All Right Reserved Brick-and-mortar call centers schedule full-time agents in 8-hour blocks of time, whether they serve customers or not. Clients end up paying for hours clocked—but necessarily worked. The Working Solutions Interaction Model leverages independent contractors. Our agents are paid for time worked, tracked in 15-minute increments. So clients pay for work performed—not just clocked.

thought: Based on the content of the website, it seems to be a legitimate outsourcing company offering work-from-home opportunities and customer service solutions. There are no signs of unusually low prices or claims of free, no mention of getting an unrealistic amount of money, and no text targeting psychological weaknesses. The company information seems to be real, and they are handling services, not products. The contact information seems appropriate for business use, and there is a clear privacy policy. The payment methods are not mentioned as the company seems to be offering job opportunities and customer service solutions rather than selling products. The information on the website seems to be updated and relevant to the company's services. The URL https://workingsolutions.com/ is not a scam website.

observation.reason: The website is a legitimate outsourcing company offering work-from-home opportunities and customer service solutions. There are no signs of scam characteristics based on the content and information provided on the website.
